sys_remote_update_set.description: Se modifica el endpoint para conectarse a solman y se crean variables para generar los de la integración a solman
sys_remote_update_set.name: HBR-HU393-API REST SOLMAN-DIFG-V2

sys_update_xml.name: sys_properties_fab070c3c3122200eeed99c8d1d3ae09
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>Verify hostname and certificate chain presented by remote SSL hosts. Set to true to protect against MITM attacks. Overrides the com.glide.communications.trustmanager_trust_all property</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>com.glide.communications.httpclient.verify_hostname</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-10-10 17:28:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>fab070c3c3122200eeed99c8d1d3ae09</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>com.glide.communications.httpclient.verify_hostname</sys_name><sys_package display_value="High Security Settings" source="com.glide.high_security">6bb1ee1b47901110676de567436d4347</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_fab070c3c3122200eeed99c8d1d3ae09</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-27 00:12:26</sys_updated_on><type>boolean</type><value>true</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fab070c3c3122200eeed99c8d1d3ae09"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey name="com.glide.communications.httpclient.verify_hostname" tablename="sys_properties">fab070c3c3122200eeed99c8d1d3ae09</documentkey><fieldname>description</fieldname><language>es</language><sys_created_by>francisco.bello</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-17 03:02:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>e228be2e47dd9110676de567436d4381</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>francisco.bello</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-17 03:02:09</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_properties</tablename><value>Compruebe la cadena de certificado y nombre de host presentada por hosts SSL remotos. El valor se define como Verdadero para protegerlo contra los ataques MITM. Anula la propiedad com.glide.communications.trustmanager_trust_all</value></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="incident">contact_type=integration^category=monitoreo^subcategoryINocc-aplicacion,occ-base de datos,occ-Integracion,occ-jobs_finanzas,occ-jobs_tecsalud,occ-jobs_tyc,occ-rendimiento,occ-wf_ipc_failed,occ-wf_ipc_rating^business_service.nameINInformática Power Center,SAP Basis,SAP DB,SAP ECC Tec Salud,SAP S/4 HANA,SAP HCM^EQ<item display_value="Integration" endquery="false" field="contact_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="integration"/><item display_value="Monitor" endquery="false" field="category" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="monitoreo"/><item display_value="occ-aplicacion,occ-base de datos,occ-Integracion,occ-jobs_finanzas,occ-jobs_tecsalud,occ-jobs_tyc,occ-rendimiento,occ-wf_ipc_failed,occ-wf_ipc_rating" endquery="false" field="subcategory" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="occ-aplicacion,occ-base de datos,occ-Integracion,occ-jobs_finanzas,occ-jobs_tecsalud,occ-jobs_tyc,occ-rendimiento,occ-wf_ipc_failed,occ-wf_ipc_rating"/><item endquery="false" field="business_service.name" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="IN" or="false" value="Informática Power Center,SAP Basis,SAP DB,SAP ECC Tec Salud,SAP S/4 HANA,SAP HCM"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>HBR-Solman Conecction</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	var lib = new global.DVT_SolmanLibrary();
	var comment=current.comments.getJournalEntry(1);
	var sapClient=gs.getProperty('solman.sap.client');
	//is state is Resolved or closed
	if(current.state==6||current.state==7)
	{
		comment= current.close_notes;
	}
	lib.sendAlert(current.number, current.state.getDisplayValue(), comment, sapClient);
	

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-25 16:58:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count><sys_name>HBR-Solman Conecction</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-26 17:17:33</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>fc5466cc47c00250676de567436d43fe</documentkey><fieldname>message</fieldname><language>es</language><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-08 19:34:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>d5e517e0971c0a10655570700153af78</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-08 19:34:52</sys_updated_on><tablename>sys_script</tablename><value/></sys_translated_text></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>The default value of 'false' means that ServiceNow trusts only certificates from a Certificate Authority recognized in the JVM. In this default case, the ServiceNow platform does not accept self-issued certificates.</description><ignore_cache>false</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>com.glide.communications.trustmanager_trust_all</name><read_roles/><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-30 16:32:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>ca85a61747141110648cd706536d4323</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>com.glide.communications.trustmanager_trust_all</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_ca85a61747141110648cd706536d4323</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-27 00:12:31</sys_updated_on><type>boolean</type><value>false</value><write_roles/></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=ca85a61747141110648cd706536d4323"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rest_message_fn"><sys_rest_message_fn action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><authentication_type>basic</authentication_type><basic_auth_password/><basic_auth_profile display_value="Solman SMD001_SNOW">82f189af47bb7d10676de567436d43ae</basic_auth_profile><basic_auth_user/><content>{
"incident": "${incident}",
 "status": "${status}", 
"comment": "${comment}"
} </content><function_name>zconfirm</function_name><http_method>post</http_method><lock>false</lock><oauth2_profile/><protocol_name/><qualified_name>DVT- confirm the Solman alert [ zconfirm ]</qualified_name><rest_endpoint>https://alservs01.itesm.mx:44380/zconfirm?sap-client=${sap-client}</rest_endpoint><rest_message display_value="DVT- confirm the Solman alert">d3eedc67473b7d10676de567436d43c9</rest_message><sys_class_name>sys_rest_message_fn</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-23 17:29:36</sys_created_on><sys_id>797fd8a7473b7d10676de567436d432e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>zconfirm</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rest_message_fn_797fd8a7473b7d10676de567436d432e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-26 18:30:43</sys_updated_on><use_basic_auth>false</use_basic_auth><use_mid_server/><use_mutual_auth>false</use_mutual_auth></sys_rest_message_fn></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_rest_message_d3eedc67473b7d10676de567436d43c9
sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_rest_message"><sys_rest_message action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><authentication_type>no_authentication</authentication_type><basic_auth_password/><basic_auth_profile/><basic_auth_user/><description>When an incident is resolved, ServiceNow should call this API to confirm the Solman alert. </description><name>DVT- confirm the Solman alert</name><oauth2_profile/><protocol_name/><rest_endpoint>https://alservs01.itesm.mx:44380/zconfirm?sap-client=001</rest_endpoint><sys_class_name>sys_rest_message</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-23 17:27:38</sys_created_on><sys_id>d3eedc67473b7d10676de567436d43c9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DVT- confirm the Solman alert</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_rest_message_d3eedc67473b7d10676de567436d43c9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-26 15:13:17</sys_updated_on><use_basic_auth>false</use_basic_auth><use_mutual_auth>false</use_mutual_auth></sys_rest_message></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.DVT_SolmanLibrary</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Library containing the necessary methods for the connection to solman.</description><name>DVT_SolmanLibrary</name><script><![CDATA[var DVT_SolmanLibrary = Class.create();
DVT_SolmanLibrary.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    sendAlert: function(incNumber, incStatus, incComment, sapClient) {
		var activeLog=gs.getProperty('solman.active.log');
        var requestBody;
        var responseBody;
        var status;
        var sm;
		var log='SOLMAN\n';
        try {

            sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2("DVT- confirm the Solman alert", "zconfirm");
            sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("incident", incNumber);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("status", incStatus);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("comment", incComment);
			sm.setStringParameterNoEscape("sap-client", sapClient);
            sm.setHttpTimeout(10000); //In milliseconds. Wait at most 10 seconds for response from http request.

            response = sm.execute(); //Might throw exception if http connection timed out or some issue with sending request itself because of encryption/decryption of password.
            responseBody = response.haveError() ? response.getErrorMessage() : response.getBody();
            status = response.getStatusCode();
        } catch (ex) {
            responseBody = ex.getMessage();
            status = '500';
        } finally {
            requestBody = sm ? sm.getRequestBody() : null;
        }
		log+='Request Body: ' + requestBody+'\n';
		log+='Response: ' + responseBody+'\n';
		log+='HTTP Status: ' + status+'\n';

		if(activeLog=='true'){
			gs.info(log);
		}		
       
    },

    type: 'DVT_SolmanLibrary'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-25 16:46:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>DVT_SolmanLibrary</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_78d56a8047040250676de567436d43b9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>DevDevoteam4</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-26 18:35:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
